DISCLOSURE_INFO:
{
  "Allegations" : "THE CLIENT ALLEGED THAT THE PROCEEDS FROM HIS WAL-MART STOCK OPTIONS WERE INVESTED IN NUMBEROUS MUTUAL FUNDS WITHIN SEVERAL FUND FAMILIES.  CLIENT ALLEGED HIS INVESTMENT OBJECTIVE WAS TO USE THERE FUNDS TO SUPPLEMENT HIS INCOME DURING RETIREMENT AND CLIENT FELT THAT HIS INVESTMENT OBJECTIVE WAS NOT MET BY INVESTING THIS MONEY IN GROWTH AND GROWTH AND INCOME EQUITY FUNDS.  THE CLIENT ADVISED HE WASNTED TO WITHDRAW BETWEN $1000-$1500 PER MONTH FROM THIS MONEY, YET THERE ARE NO INCOME FUNDS IN HIS PORTFOLIO.  THE CLIENT NOW CLAIMS HE REALIZES THAT THE ONLY WAY TO ATTAIN AN INCOME STREAM FROM THESE MUTUAL FUNDS IS TO SELL SHARES.  CLIENT ALSO COMPLAINED THAT BY INVESTING IN THREE DIFFERENT FUND FAMILIES, CLIENT DID NOT REALIZE THE OPTIMUM BREAKPOINT ON THESE INVESTED FUNDS.  THE CLIENT WANTS TO BE MADE WHOLE ON HIS ORIGINAL INVESTMENT AND ALSO REQUESTED THAT THE COMMISSION CHARGED FOR EXERCISING HIS STOCK OPTIONS BE REDUCED.  ALLEGED DAMAGES EXCEED %5000",
  "Damage Amount Requested" : "$5,000.00",
  "DisplayAAOLinkIfExists" : "N",

  "arbitrationDocketNumber" : "",
  "Broker Comment" : "IR INDICATED HE HAD SEVERAL LENGTHY APPOINTMENTS WITH CLIENT TO DISCUSS ALL DETAILS OF EXERCISING STOCK OPTIONS.  IT APPEARS CLIENT WAS FULLY AWARE OF THE COMMISSION CHARGED FOR THE SALE OF STOCK AND IR BELIEVED CLIENT APPRECIATED THE DISCOUNT GIVEN ON THE STOCK TRANSACTION(S).  IN IN REGARD TO REINVESTMENT OPTIONS, IR STATED AT CLIENT'S REQUEST HE PREPARED AN INVESTMENT PROPOSAL FOR A PORTION ($300,000) OF THE WAL-MART PROCEEDS.  IT IS OUR UNDERSTANDING CLIENT MET WITH IR TO REVIEW INVESTMENT RECOMMENDATIONS AND IR INDICATED MUTUAL FUND BREAKPOINTS WERE DISCUSSED WITH CLIENT AND OUR RECORDS REFLECT CLIENT RECEIVED THE $100,000 BREAKPOINT IN EACH FUND FAMILY.  IR STATED HE ALSO HAD A DISCUSSION WITH CLIENT REGARDING CURRENT BOND RATES AND IR SUGGESTED CLIENT MIGHT WANT TO OVERWEIGHT HIS PORTFOLIO IN GROWTH AND INCOME AND GROWTH AND EVENTUALLY SHIFT MONEY TO INCOME INVESTMENTS AS RATES INCREASE.  IR INDICATED CLIENT AGREED WITH IR'S SUGGESTION AND IR FURTHER INDICATED CLIENT'S INCOME NEEDS WOULD BE MET BY ESTABLISHING A SYSTEMATIC WITHDRAWAL FROM THE MUTUAL FUNDS.  IT IS OUR OPINION IR PROVIDED THE DETAILS FOR EXERCISING STOCK OPTIONS AND DISCUSSED REINVESTMENT OPTIONS FOR A PORTION OF THE PROCEEDS.  FURTHER, IT IS OUR OPINION CLIENT WAS AWARE OF THE ACTIVITY IN THE ACCOUNT AND ALL TRANSACTIONS WERE COMPLETED WITH CLIENT'S AUTHORIZATION.  BASED ON OUR REVIEW, WE RESPECTFULLY DENY CLIENT'S REQUEST TO MAKE ANY ADJUSTMENT TO THE ACCOUNT."
